title: Pixel 5 - Hiss on audio recordings with every app
content:
Hi,

I have a hiss/white noise in all my audio recordings with the Pixel 5. Makes no difference if its a video with the default camera app, snapchat etc. The same when using the Recorder app.

Google assistant "voice match" and "now playing" are off.

Pixel 5 audio example: http://clyp.it/2lddom40

Pixel 2XL audio example (same room, same time): http://clyp.it/sz3zgiqm

What could be the problem?

Thanks
